short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View and interact with CAD models privately, right in your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This chrome extension lets you view and interact with CAD models privately, right in your browser.

Features:
1. Works with GMail attachments
2. Support various CAD file formats -  STL & OBJ
3. No-data transfer, works 100% locally
